basic_attack.name: Basic Strike
basic_attack.description: A simple attack dealing moderate damage

heavy_hit.name: Heavy Hit
heavy_hit.description: A powerful strike dealing heavy damage

hit_and_heal.name: Draining Strike
hit_and_heal.description: Attack that heals the user for a portion of damage dealt

charged_hit.name: Charged Hit
charged_hit.description: Charges for one turn, then unleashes a devastating strike with 2x damage

metal_strike.name: Metal Strike
metal_strike.description: A powerful metal strike dealing heavy damage

tidal_surge.name: Tidal Surge
tidal_surge.description: Channels for one turn and crashes a powerful wave on the enemy

water_charge.name: Water Charge
water_charge.description: Hits for moderate water damage, converts basic attacks to water, and increases attack by 20% for 3 turns
